channel.title: Can I at puches for items?
channel.description:
i was wondering if i can add like a bag were you can put in monny and items and stuff like that just like the rune pouch things but than for real items is this posebel?
sorry for any spell fails

item.title: Can I at puches for items?
item.dc:creator: @Dylan_100123 Dylan 100123
item.description:
@Dylan_100123 wrote:

Roar337:

anything is possible and i actually like this :eek: but anyways check how items are banked the data is stored in char files but check how its stored in the java files look at the void and make somthing similar for pouches and make an int that says you already clicked pouch so when you click it again it gives your items back and resets int also check how items are removed from bank so ppl dont use pouches to dupe

i dont get it im new to this stuff so…

Read full topic
item.source: Can I at puches for items?

item.title: Can I at puches for items?
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Dylan 100123, post:1, topic:420522”]i was wondering if i can add like a bag were you can put in monny and items and stuff like that
just like the rune pouch things but than for real items
is this posebel?

sorry for any spell fails[/quote]
tax bags, a old server i had, had tax bags on it. The concept is that when you put a certain amount of $ into a tax bag it will become 1 of 4 things, Bulging, and like 3 different sizes, but what it does is you sell it to a shop for the amount of money you bought it for :3
